NAME: Shielded Strike
DESCRIPTION: Deal small physical damage invoking a shield, raising your physical defense.

NAME: Flame Blade
DESCRIPTION: Embodies your sword with fire, dealing some physical fire damage to an enemy.

NAME: Bulwark
DESCRIPTION: Spend half your mana to gain a shield equivalent to 30% of your MAXHP and raise both your physical and magical defense.

NAME: Great Charge
DESCRIPTION: Charge against an enemy, dealing moderate damage but reducing your attack.
